akn:section.akn:heading: Selection of New Markets Venture Capital companies

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Eligibility A company shall be eligible to apply to participate, as a New Markets Venture Capital company, in the program established under this part if—

(b) Application To participate, as a New Markets Venture Capital company, in the program established under this part a company meeting the eligibility requirements set forth in subsection (a) shall submit an application to the Administrator that includes—

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Requirements to be met for final approval

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Requirements to be met for final approval The Administrator shall grant each conditionally approved company a period of time, not to exceed 2 years, to satisfy the following requirements:
(e) Final approval; designation The Administrator shall, with respect to each applicant conditionally approved to operate as a New Markets Venture Capital company under subsection (c), either—
